Reviews.Title: Easy setup - Good view for price
Reviews.Author: Armand Lucas
Reviews.Content: The camera out of the box seemed too light in weight for me to take seriously but once I installed the camera I was impress with the camera resolution and after 7 months of bad weather and bird droppings I still have a working camera. Be sure to make sure your dip settings are correct before you install it. For some reason it was set to camera 2 when I got it but I figured it out soon enough.

Reviews.Title: Cheap camera, low quality, doesn't work good
Reviews.Author: First time
Reviews.Content: It worked good couple days only. After that half of the monitor screen turned into black. i have tried everything, no luck. They offered me replacement. waited for two weeks for the new one. guess what,  i got the same camera and hasn't been fixed. Now i am stucked with this low quality camera. i should have paid little more extra get get a better camera and from know seller. Not recommended, camera and the seller.

Reviews.Title: Great Value. Not perfect but great value.
Reviews.Author: iris
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  Blind at night but I knew that when I bought it.  Easy Pan Tilt Zoom.  Good video quality.The mounting bracket was simply illogical and poorly executed.  You will have to plan the installation due to the 4 cap hex head screws that connects the bracket to the mounting plate.  Up a ladder... little screws... blind assembly...This could have been thought through better.Hey but it works great and was inexpensive.
